doc.previous: To counter the German long range patrol aircraft which targeted merchant convoys the British introduced the CAM ship which was a merchant vessel equipped with a single fighter aircraft which could be launched once to engage the enemy aircraft Once escort carriers became available these were converted back into conventional merchant ships
doc.after: Maritime patrol aircraft are typically fitted with a wide range of sensors 1
